channel.title: work on > shlok deshmukh
channel.description: Recent content in work on > shlok deshmukh

item.title: Robotics Intern
item.description: Built SDFGen to convert LiDAR point clouds and reconstructed aircraft models into SDFs (signed distance fields) maps. Developed sdfgen_live (ROS) to integrate live LiDAR/rosbag data during flight and publish an SDF map for online planners while supporting initialization from prior maps for faster startup. Validated with static reconstructed aircraft models (B747/B777), flight rosbags, and hardware-in-the-loop on a DJI M300 and achieved 2 Hz SDF generation onboard. Languages and tools used: C++, ROS

item.title: Data Engineer
item.description: Engineered AWS-based data-infra (Nextflow, Docker, Terraform) to process and ingest 30â€“100 GB of biomedical datasets, per day. Trained and deployed BERT-based (BioBERT) embedding models for named-entity normalization (NEN) tasks on biomedical text. Automated daily data ingestion from multiple databanks and built tools for monitoring, validation and actionable alerts. Languages and tools used: Python, PyTorch, Docker, Terraform, AWS cloud services
